topic.title: Roles
topic.p: People could have various roles in JetBrains Marketplace. The roles provided in order from less permissive. Each next role has all the permissions of the previous one.

chapter.title: Non-registered user
chapter.p: A user who is not logged in with the JetBrains Hub account.

list.li: Read-only access to JetBrains Marketplace (can see plugin pages, download available plugin versions)

chapter.title: Registered user
chapter.p: A user who is logged in with the JetBrains Hub account.

chapter.title: Plugin Author
chapter.p: A user who is added as a Developer to at least one plugin.

list.li: Add new authors to their plugins
Edit the information of their plugins
Add custom pages to their plugins
Move their plugins to an organization if they are members of this organization and the plugins are properly configured
Apply their plugins to be sold on JetBrains Marketplace
Subscribe to the new comments/reviews of their plugins
Subscribe to the verification results of their plugins (if available)

chapter.title: Organization administrator
chapter.p: Global administrator in the scope of an organization.

list.li: Grant other organization members the administrator role
Remove the organization (only if this organization doesn't have vendor information for paid plugins)

chapter.title: Moderator
chapter.p: This role is needed for specific JetBrains team members to provide an ability to manage plugins in the scope of a family. As of now, we have the following moderator types:

list.li: Manage all plugins of a specific type (edit the information of these plugins, approve/unapprove these plugins and/or their updates, remove them).

chapter.title: Marketplace administrator
chapter.p: The role with global rights for members of JetBrains Marketplace team.
